# React Native SDK

- ## Payment Options

- ## Web Services


## Payment Options

- Net Banking
- CC / DC
- UPI
- Net Banking
- Wallets
- Emi
- Nocostemi
- CashCard

## Web Services

- Fetch Payment Options
- VAS
- Check Is Domestic
- Get Bin Info
- Get Transaction Information
- Get EMI Details
- Get Checkout Details
- Verify Payment
- Get Offer Status
- Check Offer Details
- Get User Cards
- Save User Card
- Edit User Card
- Delete Stored Card
- Lookup API

---
---

# How to use

> import
```javascript
  import PayUSdk from 'payu-core-pg-react';
```

## Payment Options
---

### Net Banking

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

// const paymentType = 'Net Banking';

const paymentData =  {
              amount: "100",
              txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
              productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
              firstName: "Testing Name",
              email: "info@example.com",
              surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
              furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
              salt: "xxxxxx",
              key: merchantKey,
              paymentType: 'Net Banking',
              bankCode:"bankcode",
              hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`),

            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```


### CC / DC

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'Credit / Debit Cards';

const paymentData =  {
      amount: "100",
      txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
      productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
      firstName: "Testing Name",
      email: "info@webinfomart.com",
      surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      salt: "xxxxx",
      key: props.merchantKey,
      paymentType: 'Credit / Debit Cards',
      nameOnCard:"xxxx",
      cardNumber:"xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx",
      expiryYear:"xxxx",
      expiryMonth:"",
      cvv:"",
      hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```

### UPI

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'UPI';

const paymentData =  {
            amount: "100",
            txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
            productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
            firstName: "Testing Name",
            email: "info@webinfomart.com",
            surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
            furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
            salt: "xxxxx",
            key: props.merchantKey,
            paymentType: 'UPI',
            vpa:"vpa"
             hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```

### Wallets

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'PayU Money';

const paymentData =   {
          amount: "100",
          txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
          productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
          firstName: "Testing Name",
          email: "info@Example.com",
          surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
          furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          key: merchantKey,
          paymentType:"payment Type",
           hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```


### Emi

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'PayU Money';

const paymentData =   {
      amount: "100",
      txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
      productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
      firstName: "Testing Name",
      email: "info@webinfomart.com",
      surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      salt: "xxxxx",
      key: props.merchantKey,
      paymentType: 'EMI',
      nameOnCard:"",
      cardNumber:"",
      expiryYear:"",
      expiryMonth:"",
      cvv:"",
      bankCode:""
       hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```

### NoCostEmi

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'PayU Money';

const paymentData =   {
      amount: "100",
      txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
      productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
      firstName: "Testing Name",
      email: "info@webinfomart.com",
      surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      salt: "xxxxx",
      key: "merchantKey",
      paymentType: 'No Cost EMI',
      nameOnCard:"name of card",
      cardNumber:"card number",
      expiryYear:"expiryYear",
      expiryMonth:"expiryMonth",
      cvv:"Cvv",
      bankCode:"bankCode",
      subventionAmount:"subvention Amount"
       hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```

### CashCard

```javascript

const handleResponse = (response) => {
  console.log({response: response});
};

const handleError = (err) => {
      Alert.alert('Error', JSON.stringify(err));
};

const paymentType = 'PayU Money';

const paymentData =   {
      amount: "100",
      txnId: "1629297548974payusdk",
      productInfo: "Mobile Phone",
      firstName: "Testing Name",
      email: "info@webinfomart.com",
      surl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      furl: "https://payu-react.domain.com/index.php",
      salt: "xxxxxxx",
      key: "merchantKey",
      paymentType: 'Cash Card',
       hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.amount}|${payUData.productInfo}|${payUData.firstName}|${payUData.email}|${payUData?.udf1}|${payUData?.udf2}|${payUData?.udf3}|${payUData?.udf4}|${payUData?.udf5}|${payUData?.udf6}|${payUData?.udf7}|${payUData?.udf8}|${payUData?.udf9}|${payUData?.udf10}|${payUData.salt}`)
            };

PayUSdk.makePayment(
    paymentData,
    (response) => handleResponse,
    (err) => handleError
  );

```

## Web Services
---

### Payment Options
```javascript

 const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          userCredentials: "username:password",
          command: PAYMENT_RELATED_DETAILS_FOR_MOBILE_SDK
           hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };

const options = await PayUSdk.fetchPaymentOptions(params);

```

### VAS
```javascript

 const params = {
      "isSandbox": false,
      "key": "xxxxx",
      "salt": "xxxxx",
      command: VAS_FOR_MOBILE_SDK,
       hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${DEFAULT}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };

const options = await PayUSdk.vas({ ...params, bankCode: 'AXIB' });

```


### Check Is Domestic
```javascript

 const params = {
          "isSandbox": false,
          "key": "xxxxx",
          "salt": "xxxxx",
          cardNumber: '622018',
          command: CHECK_IS_DOMESTIC,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };

 const response = await PayUSdk.checkIsDomestic({
          ...params,
          cardNumber: '512345',
        });

```



### Get Bin Info
```javascript

 const params = {
          "isSandbox": false,
          "key": "xxxxx",
          "salt": "xxxxx",
          isSIInfo: '1',
          cardNumber: '555676',
          command: GET_BIN_INFO,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)

 const response = await PayUSdk.getBinInfo({
          ...params,
          cardNumber: '512345',
        });

```



### Get Transaction Info
```javascript

 const params = {
      "isSandbox": false,
          "key": "xxxxx",
          "salt": "xxxxx",
          isSIInfo: '1',
          startTime: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss',
          endTime: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss',
          command: GET_TRANSACTION_INFO,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };

  let endTime = new Date();

  const response = await PayUSdk.getTransactionInfo({
    ...params,
    startTime: startTime.toISOString().slice(0, 19).replace('T', ' '),
    endTime: endTime.toISOString().slice(0, 19).replace('T', ' '),
  });

```

### Get EMI Details
```javascript

 const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          amount: '2000',
          command: API_GET_EMI_AMOUNT_ACCORDING_INTEREST,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.getEMIDetails({
          ...params,
          amount: '99',
        });

```


### Get Checkout Details
```javascript

 const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          var1: JSON.stringify({
            "useCase": {
              "checkDownStatus": true,
              "getAdditionalCharges": true,
              "getTaxSpecification": true,
              "getExtendedPaymentDetails": true,
              "getOfferDetails": true
            },
            "requestId": "1614595430989",
            "transactionDetails": {
              "amount": 5000
            },

          }),
          amount: 5000,
          checkDownStatus:true,
          checkTaxSpecification:true,
          checkAdditionalCharges:true,
          command: GET_CHECKOUT_DETAILS,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


 const response = await PayUSdk.getCheckoutDetails({
          ...params,
          amount: '99',
        });

```



### Check Offer Details
```javascript

  const params = {
      isSandbox: false,
      key: "xxxxx",
      salt: "xxxxx",
      offerKey: '@7283',
      cardNumber: "5123456789012346",
      paymentType: 'Credit / Debit Cards',
      amount: '5000',
      command: CHECK_OFFER_DETAILS,
      hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.offerKey}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.checkOfferDetails(params);

```

---
### Get User Cards
```javascript

  const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
           userCredentials: userCredentials,
          command: GET_USER_CARDS,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.getUserCards(params);

```

---
### Save User Cards
```javascript

  const params = {
      isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          userCredentials: userCredentials,
          cardName: cardName,
          cardMode: cardMode,
          cardType: cardType,
          nameOnCard: nameOnCard,
          cardNumber: cardNumber,
          expiryMonth: expiryMonth,
          expiryYear: expiryYear,
          command: SAVE_USER_CARD,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.saveUserCard(params);

```

---
### Edit User Cards
```javascript

  const params = {
      isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          userCredentials: userCredentials,
          cardToken: cardToken,
          cardName: cardName,
          cardMode: cardMode,
          cardType: cardType,
          nameOnCard: nameOnCard,
          cardNumber: cardNumber,
          expiryMonth: expiryMonth,
          expiryYear: expiryYear,
          command: SAVE_USER_CARD,
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)

    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.saveUserCard(params);

```

---
### Delete User Cards
```javascript

  const params = {
      isSandbox: false,
      key: "xxxxx",
      salt: "xxxxx",
      userCredentials: userCredentials,
      cardToken: cardToken,
      command: DELETE_USER_CARD
      hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.deleteStoredCard(params);

```

---
### verify_payment
```javascript

  const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          txnId: '1628684808250payusdk',
          command: VERIFY_PAYMENT,
           hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.txnId}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.verifyPayment(params);

```

### Check Offer Status
```javascript

  const params = {
          isSandbox: false,
          key: "xxxxx",
          salt: "xxxxx",
          offerKey: '@9875',
          amount: '5000',
          var3: 'cash',
          var4: 'ppintent',
          command: CHECK_OFFER_STATUS
          hash:sha512(`${payUData.key}|${payUData.command}|${payUData.var1}|${payUData.salt}`)
    };


  const response = await PayUSdk.verifyPayment(params);

```
